Windlord/ELita/Nighlight:

Windlord replied "I think that we can handle him... What do you say, 
Kup?" Elita started to be more uneasy and she babled aloud and 
looking at the baby said"We can speak with him, plus you migh like 
chat with Nighlight and it seems that the little one likes alittle 
more attention... By the way sir, Rattrap found some new troops... 
What do you desire to do? they wan to chat with you too"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Rodimus: If he managed to get inside, then he has to be a Maximal. 
> Azure?
> 
> The dragon bot closed his eyes and tried to figure out the man-
bot. A 
> pang of pain crossed his circuits, but he contained himself.
> 
> AzureBlade: He's unaffiliated from what I can see, but his spark 
> isn't based on standard logic processes. I can't feel it very well.
> 
> Rodimus: That's already good to know. Kup, Windlord, think you can 
> handle him?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Windlord:
> > 
> > "We found him inside the base... "replied the male "We don't kno 
> how 
> > he could came in..."
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Jeff" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> > > ::Kup::
> > > 
> > > "Sorry lads and ladies," says Kup to Rodimus and the 
> > others, "Musta 
> > > dozed off or something. Who's the odd one? Looks like a proto-
> > human 
> > > or something..." He indicates the caveman.
